song_lyrics: He Pramukh Swāmī rahe hṛudaymā akhanḍ smṛuti āpnī,
Na bhulāy antarthī kadī e divya-mūrti āpnī... He Pramukh Swāmī... Ṭek
Avanī upar agaṇit chhe, ākṛutio kudarat taṇī,
Ankāy ek ja antare, alaukik kṛuti āpnī… He Pramukh Swāmī... (1)
Chhe bandhano baḷavān atishay, mohne māyā taṇā,
E bandhano saghaḷā chhūṭe, tūṭe na prīti āpnī... He Pramukh Swāmī... (2)
Rahe jīvamāhī apūrṇatā, sādhan ghaṇā karavā chhatā,
Kṛutārth thāvā kāj bas, dṛuṣhṭi chhe pūratī āpnī... He Pramukh Swāmī... (3)
Urmā ūṭhe ūrmi agam, snehal smaraṇ chhe āpanu,
Vanmāḷīdās vade stuti, hṛudaythī guru āpnī... He Pramukh Swāmī... (4)
title: He Pramukh Swāmī rahe hṛudaymā

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1245: Vanmalidas

Category: Pramukh Swami Maharajna Pad
